div.p: Winter average pattern of sea ice loss mode in the Barents and Kara Seas: ( a) sea ice reduction (%, shading), 2 m air temperature ( red contour) and 850 hPa temperature ( black contour), ( b) upward longwave radiation ( red contour) and downward longwave radiation ( black contour), ( c) sensible heat flux ( red contour) and latent heat flux ( black contour), and ( d) net energy balance (sensible heat flux + latent heat flux + upward longwave radiation – downward longwave radiation). Figures were created with GrADS 2.1.0 ( http://cola.gmu.edu/grads/).
